body:
This new arm.py compiler file identifies the arm hpc compiler to be used on aarch64.  Followup pull requests will exercise autodetection for arm hpc compilers on aarch64 as is done for gcc. 
The main author of this file is Nick Forrington <Nick.Forrington@arm.com> and minor edits and legalese settlement by Srinath Vadlamani <srinath.vadlamani@arm.com>.
title: Arm Compiler
